<style type="text/css">
  @import url(http://www.google.com/ig/tablib.css);
 </style>
 <script type="text/javascript">
  
 function init() {
      // Initialize tabs.
      var tabs = new _IG_Tabs(__MODULE_ID__);
      
      // When you use addDynamicTab, the tab's content is
      // dynamically generated through the callback function.
      tabs.addDynamicTab("One", callback);
      tabs.addDynamicTab("Two", callback);     
      tabs.addDynamicTab("Three", callback);
 }

 // Callback that displays the current datetime whenever a
 // tab is clicked.
 function callback(tabId) {
      var date = new Date();    
      _gel(tabId).innerHTML = date.toLocaleString();
    }
    // Call init function to initialize and display tabs.
    _IG_RegisterOnloadHandler(init);
    </script>
